thread.title: Live rent-free in these Dubai areas for a month
thread.title_full: Live rent-free in these Dubai areas for a month

title: Live rent-free in these Dubai areas for a month
text: Live rent-free in these Dubai areas for a month Web Report /Dubai   Offer valid for a limited time, so hurry up. Who doesn't like some extra money? And who doesn't like it when that money is in thousands of dirhams, without you having to work for it?At a time when residents are busy writing four cheques a year and cutting down on expenses on the "rent month", an offer from Dubai Properties has come as a delight.The real estate giant is offering apartments rent-free for a month in select areas.According to details on the company's website , patrons renting out villas in Layan and Shorooq properties.A three-bedroom villa in Layan comes at Dh160,000, while a four-room property in the same area will cost Dh165,000 a year, according to information displayed on the website.A similar offer is available on three- and four-bedroom villas in Shorooq, where tenants will have to pay Dh160,000 and Dh175,200 per year, respectively. Share
